effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Increases a selected move's max [PP]{mechanic:pp} to 1.6× its original max PP.  Increases [happiness]{mechanic:happiness} by 5/3/2.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises a move's max PP by 60%.

flavor_text_entries.text:
覚えている　技のうち
１つの　ＰＰの　最大値を
最高まで　あげる。

A medicine that can optimally raise the
maximum PP of a single move that has
been learned by the target Pokémon.

Porta al limite i PP massimi di una mossa
a scelta tra quelle conosciute dal Pokémon.

Aumenta hasta el límite los PP máximos del
movimiento elegido de un Pokémon.

Maximiert die Anzahl der AP einer Attacke
eines Pokémon.

Augmente sensiblement les PP max d’une
capacité sélectionnée.

기억하고 있는 기술 중
1개의 PP 최대치를
최고까지 올린다.

おぼえている　わざのうち
１つの　ＰＰの　さいだいちを
さいこうまで　あげる。

It maximally raises the top PP of a
selected move that has been learned
by the target Pokémon.

selected move that has been learned
by the target Pokémon.

capacité sélectionnée.
